field.name: title
field.title: Provide a brief title for your campaign

field.name: description
field.title: Provide a 1-3 sentence pitch for your campaign

field.name: external_media_url
field.title: External Media URL
field.description: A link to externally hosted media promoting the campaign. For example, a Youtube video, a Flickr photo gallery, etc.

field.name: show_media_portlet
field.title: Show Media Portlet?
field.description: Uncheck if you don't want to render the Campaign Media portlet showing the image/external media in the right column

field.name: status
field.title: Status
field.description: The current status of the campaign

field.name: goal
field.title: Goal
field.description: Please type in your goal amount . Do not include any symbols such as $ or commas

field.name: donations_total
field.title: Total Raised
field.description: The total amount of donations raised in this campaign

field.name: donations_count
field.title: Total Donations
field.description: The total number of donations to this campaign

field.name: thank_you_message
field.title: Thank You Message
field.description: Provide a personalized thank you message after someone donates to your campaign. You can use the prewritten text or edit it to make it your own

field.name: contact_sf_id
field.title: Contact Salesforce ID?
field.description: The Salesforce OID of the Contact who created this campaign

field.name: parent_sf_id
field.title: Parent Salesforce ID
field.description: The Salesforce ID of the parent Campaign

field.name: thanked_donations
field.title: Thanked Donations
field.description: A list of Salesforce Opportunity IDs who have already been thanked
